properties.name: minio.access-key
properties.description: This is where to define the minio or aws s3 access key.

properties.name: minio.secret-key
properties.description: This is where to define the minio or aws s3 secret key.

properties.name: minio.endpoint
properties.description: This is where to define the minio or aws s3 end-point. However, for s3, there are some extra configurations such as the region etc. that need to be taken care of.

properties.name: minio.bucket-name
properties.description: This is where to define the minio bucket name.

properties.name: minio.endpoint-port
properties.description: This is where to define the port through which the minio client should connect.

properties.name: front.server.address
properties.description: This where you will put the frontend server address.
